Is she crazy?!
NO!
Just because you are going to bed doesn't mean you can only eat protein.

Your body burns a certain amount of calories and requires a certain amount of calories in vs out.
If you're like me, you make actually sleep better with some carbs and fats in your belly!
Now, eating 100g at 9pm is a little counterintuitive, but a moderately high carb snack is no big deal, unless your cutting and need those carbs to frame your workout.
Otherwise, eat some dang carbs after dark and sleep better with a satisfied tummy!
